testsuite.name: pl.futurecollars.invoicing.controller.invoice.InvoiceControllerTest

testcase.name: should return empty string if there is no invoices in base
should return notFound response when try to get invoice by not existing id
should return invoice by existing id

should update invoice by existing id
should return notFound response when try to delete invoice by using not existing id
should delete one out of few invoices
